content.detailedDescription: I was coming home after class in angola i noticed what appeared to be a helicopter in my neighborhood as i was getting near home. it was projecting a search light in a neighborhood just off of scott road near the end of shingle oak pointe. the craft had three white lights near each flattened point and one in the middle. i thought it might be some kind of helicopter because it had red lights as well. i like helicopters i will alway drive close to see one if i can. as i got closer it started to move toward the intersection of scott and 14 it stopped about half way over the do it best store and started moving slowly north the bright center light was dimmer at this point then it moved toward the direction of the fort wayne international airport it was traveling about fifty miles per hour and i could only follow at about thirty five mph i cannot afford any type of speeding ticket. i followed it about 1.75 miles. it flew overcopperhill addition and i lost sight of it and went home. of course my wife thought i was nuts and i did not think much about it till i saw a picture of the same type of craft on the history channel saturday feb 1 when they where talking about this type of craft that was flying around france. i think the show was called ufo hot spots. i have only seen two other ufos in my life and one was reported to be a very large asteroid that broke up over indiana when i was in high school. i would estimate it flew about 150 feet above the ground to 220 feet and was maybe 28 to thirty 35 feet between lights. i only saw a very very dim outline that may have been an illusion of the crafts true shape. i heard no sound minus the rain and my car. i saw no indication of lights dimming in houses or any means of thrust for this craft. i know that this craft looked very much like the triangle shaped craft on tv. i get out of school anywhere from 900 to1000. i am pretty sure it was very close to 1100 when i saw it but it may have been as early as 1030 pm.
content.summary: Triangle scott rd and hwy 14

content.detailedDescription: I feel silly waiting so long to report this, as i am a curious kind of person. iam also not exactly sure on the year, it could have been 1994. but i wasstanding in the heb parking lot at i-35 and wells branch pkwy. i was thereearlier than usual waiting for the capital metro bus. i lived in round rock atthe time and rode the bus in to my government clerk job with the usda in austin,tx. it must have been winter because i was cold with my coat on and it wasfoggy. that spot in the parking lot is now where the fuel island is, but at thattime that heb did not have a fuel island. i was leaning against my car facingnorth. heard a small jet sound on my right. turned to look and saw and objectlifting almost straight up. the object had oscillating lights flashing insequence indicating a circular structure. i could not see the craft in part dueto the fog, but oddly because it seemed shrouded in a haze of its own. at thetime i saw it, i noticed its ascent was so straight up, that it appeared to havelifted off from almost behind the store. there is a little house there, but inever had the nerve to go to that house and ask if they knew of anything likethis. i rationalized since then that there is a small airport very nearby. butit went straight up like a helicopter, made the sound of a jet, lifted veryslowly. what bothers me the most is my numb reaction to the whole thing ithappened about 10 years ago, yet facing this and accepting this as a realitymakes me nervous and i dont know why. i try to laugh it off and tell myself thateven aliens like to shop at heb. i have only told my husband about this a fewtimes, he is very supportive but doesnt know what to make of it either. i know iam not crazy. i dont mind talking to you people about this. but please keep mesafe from having my personal life disrupted. thank you.
content.summary: I saw oscillating lights indicating a circular for

content.detailedDescription: I was 10 when my mom and i went to pickup my older brother from work as we weregoing home i saw a light in the sky it approached our car and followed usstaying about 100 to 150 ft. behind and above us. when we apprached traffic itmoveed away and when we left the populated areas it returned. it was round andit had a bulge on top it was shaped like a derby hat it had lights on the edgeand windows on the bulge.
content.summary: Sighting when i was 10

content.detailedDescription: I observed a light in the night sky moving at an aircraft speed. it was movingfrom west to east from the time i saw it,about 30 miles. i didnt think muchabout it until it stopped in mid air over an area where salt river power plantis located. that got my attention and that is when i call my wife outside. ithovered for about 10 to 15 seconds and during that time several smaller objectswhite in color entered to main object.  the object changed directions and made astraight 90 degree change of direction. it flew straight north. we were able toobserve it for about 5-10 seconds, until it was out of sight. i estimate that wewere able to watch it for 60 to 80 miles in that short span of time.Of course i wasnt convinced completly that is what i saw. a retired air forcepliot was teaching at the school that i was at, and i told him the story.  helaughed a little but said that he would check with radar at luke air base to seeif they had any sightings on that date. couple days later col. perry indicatedto me that there had been sighting on radar that particular evening.
content.summary: Dumb founded

content.detailedDescription: I went outside behind our store for a smoke break. i looked up to admire thebeautiful sky, and observed a silvery disc hovering at an estimated 5002b feet. i was looking northwest, over the tall trees behind our building. myinitial reaction was wow, theres another one, and its hovering over the airforce academy this was the second time in 3 years that i had observed the verysame type of object.My second thought was maybe its a weather balloon i then went inside our storeand asked one of my co-workers, hey, ya wanna see a ufo after a few minutes ofyoure high, my co-worker came out to see for himself. the object was stillthere, in the same position, and it had not moved. after 5 or so more minutes ofgawking, we went back inside. just to make sure that it wasnt a star, a balloonor something else, i went back outside about 10 minutes later and the object wasgone.Now, i say that this is the second time, as a few years earlier, during anothersmoke break at our old store some 5 miles south, i saw an identical object. itwas during a summer rain, it had just started to sprinkle. i had anotherco-worker with me then. he was the one that said, whats that, a ufo i thenlooked up and concurred.My past history with these sorts of things has a long history. i can remembernocturnal visitors as far back as 1965, when my family was stationed at fthuachuca, az. from conversations with arizona natives since then, they assuredme that theres some mighty strange things happening out that way.Between these recent sightings and 1965, the most memorable close-up sightingwas during a junior high school camping trip out in lost park, colorado. i musthave been about 14 at the time. the most memorable thing was that as anear-field sighting, it was crystal clear. it was a classic saucer, no domes, nolights, just glowing. i turned to my tent-mate and said do you see what i see hereplied, yeah, i do. is that proof enoughi must emphasize that ive been a long-time student of the phenomenon, and untilnow, have had no real reason to report any of these sightings for fear ofridicule. my observations are, in my opinion, as objective as i can make them tobe. im not prone to sensationalism, and have again in my opinion a healthyattitude and a keen eye for hoaxes and mis-identifications. my only question iswithin a 50 mile radius, we have peterson afb, schriever afb, norad, the usafaand fort carson, and they cant see these thingsid really like some help in figuring this out. if anything, these
content.summary: Sightings over colorado springs, colorado

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness this event, but the witnesses i spoke to are highly credible,yet would not bother to report this. this happened over a densley populated areaso i am sure others saw it. over downtown albany, ny balls of light werereported moving at angles twoard the sky. the balls varied in color from whitishto yellow and orangish hues. they moved upwars like bottle rockets quickly butwithout sound and some appeared to be very close within 50 feet while othersappeared to be on the distant horizen. they all appeared looking south out of awindow in the direction of the capital building, downtown and over the hudsonriver. these balls appeared once ever 3-10 seconds and continued for a longtime. witnesses used to live in area where nothern lights occured and says theyare entierly different, also ruled out fireworks becuase there was no sound,they varried in distance over miles, they did not act or explode like fireworksand came from different directions but all basically moved upwards. the upwardsdirection also rules out meteors-as well as the fact that they occured with morefrequency than historic meteor showers and appeared to be much much closer.
content.summary: Balls of light over downtown albany, ny

content.detailedDescription: Being on the third floor balcony of my house at about 1505pm, i was taking testphotographs with my new polarizing filter since the lighting conditions werevery pleasant. aiming at the eastern horizon of a small mountain imitos that isa few miles from my house, i noticed a bright silvery object gliding through theeyepiece frame. at first, i assumed it was an airplane, though midway throughthe eyepiece frame it started making loops and circles. intrigued by this, i putthe camera down and looked to see what it was. to my surprise i could seenothing with my bare eyes. picking back up the camera and adjusting the linearpolarizer to the point where the sky seemed darkest i was again able to clearlysee it. this was not due to the zoom of my lens since it has a maximum of 70mmzoom, very close to the human eye equivalent of 50mm and seemed to be solely dueto the polarizing filter, since by turning the polarization plane away from thedarkest sky point the object disappeared. i repeatedly tried to see the objectwith my bare eyes by marking its position while seeing it through the polarizerthough was unable to do so with the exception of one instance where i think isaw a faint gleam where the object should have been. this was very surprising tome since it was very vivid through the camera.Quite intrigued, i took pictures while it swirled in the sky. at that point iwas rationalizing that it maybe was a large remote control model plane orcopter, though some things still didnt fitit seemed to be flying higher than i would expect it to and it was veryreflective, no hint of color paint, to mention my first observations.Unfortunately, because i could only see it through my camera i was unable toassess its distance and, thus, size. beside these facts, such items remote modelplanes are very scarce and luxurious in this part of the world.After about 5 minutes of observation i was surprised seeing four more of theseobjects couldnt discern any differences between the five entering the view paneof my camera when they started an elegant skydanceeach one orbiting each other weaving in and out of an imaginary sphere. somewould occasionally stroll off upwards or towards the south and come back again.After about 3 minutes of this they dispersed to the south and what seemed frommy viewpoint as up and were too far for me to observe, something made harder bythe fact that they were going closer to the sun so the polarizer had no effectat that angle.At some point during this encounter,
content.summary: 5 silvery objects seen through polarizing filter

content.detailedDescription: Lowest_altitudelowest_altitudeout on my farm turning the soila bright flash of lightsome kind of diski was scared at first then i got dizzy and passed outdistancedistanceit just sat their and then out of no where it dissapearedwitness2_age_groupchildflighthoveringflightfaded_in_and_outit fadded like it blended in wid the skywitness2_exact_age8direct_first_obsvedswitness2_genderwitness2_genderwitness2_occupationoccupationwitness3_age_groupchilddirect_last_obsvedswshapebullet_or_missilesurfacereflectivewitness3_exact_age12
content.summary: Geoligist

content.detailedDescription: 1. i had just picked up a girl for a date at her house on berry road. we headedsouth on berry road several blocks until we came to the t-intersection withimhoff road.2. i turned left east onto imhoff. in the process of turning i caught a glimpseof a flaming object in the sky traveling level from east to west.3. i first thought that it was an airplane on fire.4. i pulled the car over to the side of the road and got out and moved to theleft front of my vehicle always facing south toward the object. for some reasoni expected my date to get out of the car too but she didnt and yet i dontremember any visual of her sitting in the car with this periphreal glance. i wasaware of no other traffic or people either at this suburban intersection.The object, rumbling through the air breathing fire-appeared to be a hugevolcanic-like rock flying level...Only the action of the flaming object didntseem to obey the laws of physics as to motion and fire breathingaction-waextravagant extravagent camouflage or what. the object is moving to myright and yet the fire coming out of a hole in the rock shoots straight towardme even thoughitselfobject tself was moving at a steady speed perpendicular tome. this is the strangest thing and it didnt seem to make sense at the time andi couldnt take my eyes off from it. how could this huge flaming rock in the skybehave like thiseven more strange was my reaction to get back into the car and drive off andcontinue the date we went to a movie or something timely without reporting orever even discussing what we saw to each other or anybody else....As if it neverhappened-definitely not like me now or any other time in my life under normalsituations, let alone the moment of a life-time. i drove off in the oppositedirection never pursuing or following up on the incident-other than noting anarticle in a local newspaper later on a similar siting near the east coast ofthe us...Pennsylvania, vermont or new hampshire maybe.5. the object continued below the cloud ceiling as if flying undercontrol....The low rumbling sound emitted was not a jet whine or pistondriven-it did give the impression of the sound of a large object in motion butdidnt leave a wake or a jet wash....I watched it as it headed toward the westernhorizon-it
content.summary: Encounter with a flaming flying rockboulder

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the dog crap i needed to pick up and i saw my dogsbarking at the sky, so i looked up and saw what i first thaught was a low aircraft. but this thing went from a dead stop to what i think must have been 1 or2 hundred mph, i stood there and watched it for 1 to 2 minuets going north eastthan it stoped and went south west stoped on a dime and went the otherdirection. fastest f--king thing i have ever seenit was 35 to 40 feet roundmaybe biggerit had a color of blue grey-ish. i was watching it as it went southwest than it just dissapiered damnest thing i have ever seen what a expieriance,never seen a thing like that befor
content.summary: Saw a disc shaped craft with 6 lights steady faste

content.detailedDescription: I was at the bottom of my street and i was going home at the time.I noticed itwene i saw a giant thing in the air.I thought the object was a alion ship.Myreactions to the event was just amazed and my reactions were stiffness then ranhome to show every onelse.It was like a blimp but a 100 or 700 times bigger thana blimp.It had yellow lines on top an bottom and a yellow dot on the front,ayellow dot on the back,a yellow dot bellow the top line,and a yellow dot abovethe yellow line on the bottom.It also had like blue wrighting in a red coloredrectangel which was in between the yelow dots and lines i also dont think it wasby any humans.Its actions were just setting there then when i got home to showeveryonelse it disappered with no sound,no dust it just disappered with out atrace.
content.summary: Saw lines with lights and wrighting withlights
Digital photo on jan. 26, 2003

content.detailedDescription: I wasstanding on the street in front of our house having a cigarette just before9pm, looking at the sky which was particularly clear at the time, i often watchfor satellites passing over,which is what i first thought the object was.It was  like a satellite in appearance, a moving star-like point of light.I first spotted it approximately 20 degrees above the southern horizon and itmoved in a straight line overhead. i lost sight of it approximately 10 degreesabove the northern horizon. what struck me as unusual about it was thetremendous speed it was travelling at. i would estimate it was at an orbitalheight, yet it took only 10-15 seconds to transit, compared to 10-15 minutes for the satellites i often see go over. it was silent and the light was constantwith no flashing nav. lights of any kind. i checked heavens above.Com forsatellites passing over at that time but there were none transitting withinthose times. although there was nothing overly spectacular about this sighting iwas highly impressed by the speed the object was travelling at.
content.summary: Object transiting over mullumbimby nsw australia.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the backyard with witness 2, we were both smoking a cigaretteand talking about music.I was in a chair facing the south and witness 2 wasfacing nothwest. being an avid aviation fan i noticed what i thought was to be ahelicopter in the distance. i couldnt tell what type it was because it still wasat a distance. i went back to my conversation and about a minute later i glancedback up and noticed it was much closer, at that time i noticed that it was not ahelicopter. i looked harder and i still wasnt sure what it was. i told witness 2to check that out, he looked to the south and said he didnt know what it was. asthe object got closer i noticed it was a spherical shape and it was surroundedby a thin smogy aura, the aura reminded me of the rings of saturn. the spherewas a brownish black color with no noticable markings, lights, or appendages.The aura was a translucent brown gray. the object was moving slowly from thesouth travelling north at a low rate of speed. it would fly, actually itappeared to float, but it would move north and then it would fly in a tightcircle and continue north. it did this several times, it seemed to have nopurpose for these manuevers as they came at different lengths of travel, but italways continued north. there was absolutely no sound coming from the object, ifit was a conventional aircraft of any sort there would have been some noise. asthe object was over head witness 3 came outside i guess she noticed that we werelooking at something because she asked what we were doing and all wemyself and 2could do was point at the object. we all felt apprehensive about the situation.We watched it for another minuter or so, when 3 said that someone should callthe fresno air terminal and ask if they knew something about it. i called theairport and asked them if they had any aircraft in this area and they said no. ididnt tell them about the object. i went back outside and it was gone, they saidthey watched it until they lost view of it behind some trees. i would guess thatit had been flying at  5000 ft. it was probably 30-40 ft across the sphere and60-70 ft across the aura. it was moving at approx. 200-300 mph. it did not movelike any aircraft i have ever seen. i was wondering if any other reports weremade like this around this area or time frame. have there been
content.summary: Observed a small dark orb flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was at my residence south of davenport, wa. at approx 1930hrs my nephew calledand said there was a strange object in the sky near my home. rick and i walkedoutside my garage and looked in the general direction my nephew said he sawobject. we spotted the object, which initially we thought was an airplane,however it never moved not up or down or left to right not in the slightest.  wedecided to take the binoculars and drive up into my field for a better look. youcould not see the main structure of the craft, but the lights were quitebrilliant white then red then blue-violet, continuous, and i repeat it nevermoved a bit. we watched for half an hour got bored and returned to the house. ishowed it to my wife, daughter and son. rick went home claiming it had to be aplanet, but it was not there on following eves. my son continued to monitor itthrough our living room window until about 10pm., then we all turned in for thenight. my nephew said he and his friend observed 2 objects, the one which i havedescribed plus another which he said appeared the same as this one. the lightson the object appeared to rotate in a circular motion as if positioned eitherabove or below the object, however i could not discern the shape or color of theobject, since the lights appeared to travel in a circular motion, i probablyassume a spherical shape.
content.summary: Witnessed a spherical object with muliple colored

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bicycle home from a friends house.  the sun had just dippedbelow the horizon.  the sky was lit but not bright. it was completely clear  iwasnt wearing a jacket l.I.,n.Y. - also year above may be not be perfect.My eye was caught by what i believed to be a shooting star.  as i watched it iwaited for it to burn out.  it left what i believed to be a vapor trail behinditwhat i understand to be the phenomenon that accounts for the fine line cloud ajet plane leaves in its path.After travelling a relatively short distance accross the sky, the fire ball madea perfect 90 degree turn without changing its speed or banking the curve.  to mysuprise it continued on this path about 3 times 3 90 degree angles travellingthe same distances before each turn.The vapor trail left behind described the impossible trajectory of its pathperfectly.  i sped home on my bicycle as qickly as possible to show someone athome what it left behind.  unfortunately as i was pedelling, i was watching thetrail become gradually wind blown.  by the time i got home there was nothingleft to shock anyone.The object appeared and dissappeared instantaneously.  not suprising if not forthe impossible trajectory it took during the approximately 15 seconds of visualmovement across the sky.
content.summary: Ball of fire light travelling at 90 degree angles

content.detailedDescription: I was 3, and i was going to bed, when i looked out the window, and saw it.  ifirst noticed the object because it had stood out really badly against the nightsky.  i thought it was a ufo.  oh my gosh i think would be my reaction.  itstarted moving slowly upwards, then it moved downwards toward the ground, thenlanded for about a minute, then took off.  it looked like a saucer with a bubbleon top of it and covered in brightly colored window panes, each a differentcolor.  i lost sight of the object when i ran downstairs to get my father.  bythe time i got back, it was gone, and my father did not believe me.
content.summary: Oval shaped abnormality with multicolored lights

content.detailedDescription: I was around 10 yrs. old during the most significant event, but i believe therewere others. i dont remember seeing a spacecraft. i saw the enities only. hereis my story of the most significant event that i have conscious awareness of. islowly opened my bedroom door to peer out and investigate the dynamics of mysituation. i was well rehearsed in the exact characteristics of every bedroomdoor i ever lived in due to my daytime practices opening and reopening of thedoor for a reason unknown to me. my bedroom was in the middle of the hallwaywith the bathroom diagonally across the hall. my parents and brothers room wasto my right and further down the hall with the living room and subsequently thekitchen being to my left. i could turn on the kitchen light without anyonenoticing i was there because the light from my bedroom was just strong enough toilluminate the way without alerting any one of importance to blowing my cover.Simple enough right wrong i quickly moved down the carpeted hallway and passed asmall front door foyer to my left. the hallway opened up into a huge sunkenliving room requiring me to step down walk a few steps and step back up to myleft and into the dining room and kitchen combination. the light switch was justto the right on the wall as you step up into the dining room. i was reaching forthe light switch when i saw it. a bright green hazy glow in the corner of theroom.  i focused my terror filled eyes on it and i saw what appeared to be askull like thing floating in the air. the dining room table was directly infront of it and i think i saw the slim body portions behind the table.
content.summary: I was abducted i believe to be many times as a chi

content.detailedDescription: After heavily drinking i decided to take my dog for a walk, near my house ilooked up a to my surprise i saw a ufo land in front of me. out of the ufo asmall robot came out wearing a robe or cape i couldnt tell cos it was dancingand transparant. i then had a sexual dream, then my dog died
content.summary: Silver disc

content.detailedDescription: I woke up in the morning and went out on my back porch on the second floor of myhouse to have a smoke. as i was peering in the sky to the east i noticed a largeglowing object flying at aprox of 500-1500mph. im guessing this bassed on thesight of how fast jet going by. it looked as if it was coming right through ourastmostphere and crashing far out into the ocean which is the view to my rightwhich is west. it fly as far as i could see still traveling at enourmous speedsand i didnt see it again. shortly after the passing of this ufo i saw an f-16come by in the opposite patch of the ufo flying east at about the same altitudeas the object. i still to this day do not know what it was. nothing in the newsabout anything like it in the area.
content.summary: Huge red and fiery flying object traveling at thou

content.detailedDescription: We were on top of this mountain over looking cebu city when i saw this bigbright star that stood out, it changed color as it pulsated first a bright whitecolor and the object seemed to get bigger then it changed color to a kind ofreddish orange color and the object seemed to get smaller. i had a camcorderwith me and i was watching it go through these changes and it was repeatingitself after a couple of seconds as if by rythum, i zoomed in as best i couldwithout distorting the object and i kept it as still as possible. i got somegreat footage. i dont know what this is, it might be something simple orsomething extrordinary. we were all calm when i first saw this and mentioned itto everybody, but i was the only one with a camcorder.  it just hovered there inone spot didnt make any sounds but as far as judging distance it was more than amile away, i cant be exactly sure. we watched for about ten minutes then we hadto leave and that was the last i saw of it.  id like for someone if yourinterested to check this out and let me know what this thing was.
content.summary: A very bright pulsating light that truly stood out
Fleet of approx. 9 objects flew overhead slowly an

content.detailedDescription: I was at home sitting down when three bright lights caught my eye out of thewindow.They looked like very bright stars.As they got closer they got bigger asthey got bigger they became clearer.They got very close to the house i ran outside the frount. there was three very large ufos.They just stoped above thetrees across the road.All three were round with a dome on top.The windows weresquare and went right around.It was very bright inside and i could not see anything in the windows.Then one went straight ahead.The other went to the right.The other one stayed right where it was.I dont know how long it lasted for. assoon as the other two went they were back.They took up the same position and allthree left as they came.It was if someone pushed reverse.I was not frightend ieven waved.When they left i sat down i felt very calm. i have only told myfamily this. as far as i know i was the only one who saw this which i find hardto beleave.There was no sound at all.I live near gatwick airport and worked atthe airpoot so i know what a plane looks like.They were not aircraft.I cant putthe latitude or longitude as i dont know how sorry.It was dark and there was noclouds in the sky.This happened a long time ago and i can still see them as ifit was yesterday. had to put ca as it would not send take no notice
content.summary: Three large ufos

content.detailedDescription: First of all, the event took place on jan. 20, 2003, but your form would not letme put in the proper year.I was on my way home from my mothers home, traveling south on route 14, comingfrom schyler county into chemung county.  i first spotted the object in milportny. at that time the object was heading in a southerly direction. i lost sightof the object for quite a while.  i was traveling at about 50 miles a hour andit was moving rapily away from me.When i got into elmira ny, i spotted the object again over an appartment houselocated on davis st. in elmira.  the object hovered over the building for a longtime.  i heard no noise coming from the object.  i would have to say that theobject was a grey to a darker color.  the object was rounded in the rear andpointed at what i thought was the front.  i only saw yellow and orange lights onthe object.  it never moved from the last spot i saw it.  i dove the rest of theway home wondering what it was that i had seen.  i have used my uncles e-mail asi do not have a computer.  however, he is willing to relay any questions thatyou may have to me.
content.summary: Unknown hovering craft

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of school when i looked into the skyline. i saw a pulsatinglight, but thought it was mearly a building with its lights on, but as i lookedcloser i realized this was something i have never seen before. i though tomyself again, it has to be a plane, but the smooth surface, and golden colorthat shown through the night convinced me it was not. my body quaked, and heartpounded slightly harder as i watched as this sky vehicle raced away in its quickstream.
content.summary: Disk like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Barbourville, kentuckyi was about 14 or 15 when i was a passenger in car with granparents lookingoutside towards mountains saw a large black triangle over mountain in southeastky knox county very big wide as mountain top i seemed to forget about it for 10years until recently ive started reliving the moment in my mind i saw anotherufo with a lot of other people around 1973 grandmother was at a teachers meetingin canon ky close to barbourville ky knox county it followed us all the way tobarbourville was chevron shaped .
content.summary: Large black triangle spoted in knox county ky in m

content.detailedDescription: It is a clear night with many stars visible. there are no clouds. my wife and icommented on how the moon had recently risen as it was almost full. about 5minutes later, i looked for the moon again but it was gone it was as ifsomething huge was in front of it blocking our view. i scanned the sky verycarefully and could not see anythingno moon, no clouds, just stars, although the sky itself was bright. i leftconfused and wondering what had happened. when i looked again about a half hourlater, there was the moon again i am a former astronomy consultant to cuforn anda former member of mufon. i am curious to know if anyone else saw thisphenomenon by the way, the year is 2003, although that option isnt available onyour siteform. please update
content.summary: Almost full moon vanished then reappeared

content.detailedDescription: This event was a sound only. i was in a parking lot next to a restaurant near anairport. a loud sound that had several pitches swirled around the area. itsounded like what you would expect in a ufo movie. the noise went in a circulardirection and seemed to reflect off nearby buildings. my first thought was i wasimagining what i heard, but i turned to see the expression on my sons face and afamily several yards away standing in amazement so i knew it was real. when myson and i walked past the family, they asked us if we saw anything---no, andneither had they. neither my son, nor i know what to think, but it definatelywas something most people never hear. thats it.
content.summary: Sounds

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on sept. 9th 2002 at approx. 930 p.M. and observeda largepulsating object heading east on the horizon. all of the sudden a blinkingobject flew towards it, then a small white sphere shot out of it at a 45 degreeangle.Then the large object changed direction and began traveling south until itdisappeared on the horizon. i have a really compelling video
content.summary: Saw very large, bright object, smaller object shot

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across street, bright object seen just as main body passed behindbuilding. thought it was vert. stab. of military aircraft.  no sound.  it wasdescending at about 5 - 10 degree angle.  next day, local paper reported mysteryaircraft, about to crash, was reported by hundreds of folks, for many milesalong the ohio river.  no crash was reportedno military base had any aircraft in the area at the time.  no one couldidentify exact type of aircraft even tho during wwii many of us were familiarwith common types of military aircraft.  i cannot recall exact time of year butthe year was most likely 1943, perhaps 1944.
content.summary: Saw portion of metallic object
